description: Educational science games for children and students

games.title: Little Alchemy 2
games.description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!

games.title: Animal DNA Run
games.description: Animal DNA Run is a casual game where you can mix animal DNA to create new and unique creatures. Each animal has its own abilities, so make sure you mix animal DNA according to your needs. For example, combine the DNA of a shark and a tiger to create an animal that can swim yet run very fast, or a monkey and an eagle to create an animal that can climb rocks and fly over cliffs!

games.title: Skeleton Simulator
games.description: Skeleton Simulator is a simulation game created and developed by Andres Adendaal of Wireframe. In this little science experiment, take control of the skeleton's different points of articulation and see how it changes the way a human walks with those changes. You can even add another skeleton to see their funny interactions!
